question: [Note] Turkce: (44, 135), (41, 55), (153, 160) noktalarindan olusan ucgenin alanini ve cevresini hesapla.

qas.question: [Note] Turkce: (44, 135), (41, 55), (153, 160) noktalarindan olusan ucgenin alanini ve cevresini hesapla.
[Calm] Portugues: Calcule a area e o perimetro do triangulo definido por (44, 135), (41, 55), (153, 160). Provide only the area.
[Check] Svenska: Berakna arean och omkretsen for triangeln med (44, 135), (41, 55), (153, 160). Provide only the perimeter.
